taDuoc: Copovidon VA 64, natri hydrocarbonat, Effer soda (natri hydrocarbonat 88-90%, natri carbonat 10-12%), Crospovidon CL, lactose monohydrat, colloidal anhydrous silica, magnesi stearat, Sepifilm LP 014, hydroxypropylmethylcelulose phthalat, polyethylen glycol 6000, talc, titan dioxyd, Erythrosin lake
